title: Contact Center Agent (Igbo and Hausa) Job at Workforce Group
content:
Workforce Group is a top business and HR consulting firm in Nigeria, offering advisory, outsourcing, recruitment and assessment, learning and development, market entry and technology services and solutions. Our reputation for excellence in service was built from over a decade of providing business and human resource consulting across several states in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Contact Center Agent (Igbo and Hausa)

Job Locations: Iganmu and Lekki, Lagos

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Respond to customers’ enquiries, requests, and complaints via telephone, email, live chat & Social media within the given turnaround time 
	Manage and resolve customer complaints; follow up on escalated issues by liaising with relevant business teams to resolve issues arising from customer complaints, process, or regulatory breach 
	Research, identify, and resolve customer complaints using applicable software 
	Assist customers place and complete orders in timely manner while adhering to standard policies and procedures 
	Identify and monitor trends of customer complaints and escalate issues to supervisor(s)/stakeholders appropriately 
	Process customers’ orders, forms, and applications; follow through to ensure order fulfilment 
	Document all customer interactions according to standard operating procedures on the applicable CRM solution.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND / B.Sc Degree.
	Age range - 26 years below.


Remuneration


	Salary: N213,000 Monthly.
	HMo, Pension, 13 months and other benefits.

title: Job Openings at Crystal Thorpe
content:
Crystal Thorpe is incorporated in United Kingdom to develop and manage specialist hospitals and clinics in Nigeria. The company provides turnkey solution to hospital ventures from concept development, feasibility analysis, equipment planning to commissioning. Our main clients include insurance companies, corporate institutions and governments. We also aim to attract patients from neighboring West African countries.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Medical Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Qualifications and Experience
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Candidates for this position must possess an MBBS / MD from any recognised institution.
	Candidates must possess MBBS with at least 2 years of post qualification experience.
	Candidates must possess a current practicing license.
	Good interpersonal skills essential
	Willingly to learn/use electronic medical records
	Key competencies and attributes
	Commitment to safety and quality of care 
	Non-judgmental, flexible, creative, patient, and tolerant
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Strong team player with organizational skills
	Must be polite and gentle with patients and colleagues.


Application Closing Date: 30th June, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@crystalthorpe.org using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Hospital Porter

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Our Hospital porters have a varied role focused on the safe and efficient movement of people and items within a healthcare facility. 
	Their duties include transporting patients, delivering medical equipment and supplies, handling waste, and assisting with various tasks to support hospital operations.
	They also contribute to maintaining a clean and organized environment.


Application Closing Date: 15th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@crystalthorpe.org using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Hospital Pharmacist

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Bachelor of Pharmacy
	Minimum of 2 years of post-qualification experience.
	Registered member of PCN
	Candidate to work within the pharmacy department
	Ability to work independently and good commercial acumen is essential. 
	Must be polite with good communication skill and gentle with patients
	Good IT skills  as you will be using an electronic medical records system if successful.


Application Closing Date: 15th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@crystalthorpe.org using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

4.) Hospital Radiographer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements   


	Minimum of 2 years of post qualification experience
	Working within the diagnostic services in a hospital environment.  
	Experiences with CT, Ultrasound and Xray is required
	Must be pleasant and smart
	Must be polite with good communication skill and gentle with patients
	Experience in the use of Cardiac CT will be an advantage
	Computer literate and familiarity with windows and MS.


Application Closing Date: 15th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@crystalthorpe.org using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
